text: Avoid the ASUS ZenBook Pro UX580GE-XB74T 15.6" Intel Core i9 8th Gen 8950HK (2.90 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit Gaming Laptop if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. Fans get extremely loud, like a jet engine.. Looking to return it.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the ASUS ZenBook Pro UX580GE-XB74T 15.6" Intel Core i9 8th Gen 8950HK (2.90 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. It Wi-Fi drops intermittently frequently when playing Valorant, and the performance throttles significantly. The speakers has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Had several issues with the ASUS ZenBook Pro UX580GE-XB74T 15.6" Intel Core i9 8th Gen 8950HK (2.90 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit Gaming Laptop since day one. performance throttles under load and the trackpad feels cheap. Performance in streaming games is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Had several issues with the ASUS ZenBook Pro UX580GE-XB74T 15.6" Intel Core i9 8th Gen 8950HK (2.90 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit Gaming Laptop since day one. blue screens occasionally and the keyboard feels cheap. Performance in content creation and gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Avoid the ASUS ZenBook Pro UX580GE-XB74T 15.6" Intel Core i9 8th Gen 8950HK (2.90 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit Gaming Laptop if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. The chassis feels surprisingly flimsy for the price.. Looking to return it.
